alert.note: Alert for Boone (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:24PM EDT until June 22 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN BOONE AND NORTHWESTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES... At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Miami Heights, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Cheviot, Cleves, Shawnee, Taylor Creek, Bridgetown, Blue Jay, University of Cincinnati, Delhi Township, Monfort Heights, Miami Heights, Mack, Delhi Hills, Grandview, Addyston, North Bend, Dent, Francisville, Covedale and Miamitown. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 3 and 4. I-74 in Ohio between mile markers 5 and 19. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 2 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
